context.p: A schema within the Deployment Inventory Tool is used to represent the structure of your document.
Create a new schema for the Deployment Inventory Tool

info.p: Click the schema view from the nav bar at the top
Click the Create new schema button
Enter the details as shown below.
NOTE: Restrictions on the fields are as follows:

ul.li: Name must be between 3 and 20 characters
Version must be a valid version

info.p: Click the Save button and you will be redirected back to the previous page
NOTE: Schema will not save if any fields are invalid (RED in UI)

result.p: A New Schema is created in the Deployment Inventory Tool.
